sentences.sContent: This is its chance to slake the insecurities built during the isolationist years of the Cultural Revolution.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is its chance to slake the insecurities built during the isolationist years of the Cultural Revolution.
sentences.sCn: 这是它消除文革期间那段孤立主义岁月所造成的不安全感的机会。

remMethod.val: s+lake(湖) → 看到湖水很满足 → 满足
